text: with Amazon chime and Amazon chime for
Outlook add-in scheduling meetings for
others only requires a little setup
before you are ready to go if you are
using Outlook on Windows this video
shows you how to schedule Amazon chime
meetings for someone else there are
three steps to complete the other person
as you as a delegate you install Amazon
chime for Outlook add-in you schedule
meetings from Outlook to schedule
meetings for another person ask them to
add you as a delegate if they haven't
already they need to install the Amazon
chime app on Mac or Windows
is done then they add you as a contact
if they use windows then they choose
file settings meetings if they use Mac
they choose Amazon chime preferences
meetings
in the delegates area they enter your
name and choose ad
you are now a delegate
the second step is to install the Amazon
chime for Outlook add-in exit outlook
launch the Amazon chime windows app
choose meetings scheduled a meeting fowl
a calendar should be displayed as the
calendar application next choose
scheduled with Outlook follow the
installation instructions then restart
outlook
verify that the Amazon chime for Outlook
add-in was installed by choosing
calendar and ensuring that scheduled
Amazon chime meeting shows on the
Outlook calendar ribbon next sign into
the Amazon chime brow look add in an
Outlook calendar ribbon choose the
scheduled Amazon time meeting list and
choose sign in provide your Amazon chime
credentials
you only do this one time as your
information is stored choose the
schedule Amazon time meeting list and
choose international dial in the dialing
numbers for selected countries are
remembered and added to your subsequent
meeting instructions choose save
next goes the calendar of the person for
whom you are scheduling and open their
Outlook calendar to open up a new
appointment window from the invite
ribbon choose schedule Amazon chime
meeting the Amazon chime add-in prompts
you to select the account to use in
scheduling the meeting select the
drop-down to show all Amazon chime users
for whom you are set as a delegate and
choose the calendar owner choose ok
Amazon chime add-in prompts you to
select the meeting ID type if you are
scheduling an internal meeting choosing
personal meeting ID is ideal however if
you are scheduling back-to-back
overlapping or highly confidential
meetings choose the one-time meeting ID
Amazon chime generates a special 10
digit pin that can be used for a single
meeting event or for recurring series if
you choose a one-time meeting ID bamas
on chime for Outlook add-in populates
invite with the following the email
address of the person for whom you're
scheduling the meet at chime DWS email
address the pin plus ID at chime AWS
address the meeting instructions which
include the meeting join link dial and
information and meeting ID to use Amazon
chime auto call feature make sure you
leave all the attendees in the to field
edit the meeting instructions as needed
to complete the invite including
attendees subject date and time and
recurrence
choose send to notify attendees in
Amazon chime
about adding Amazon chime to an existing
meeting on someone else's Outlook
calendar open an existing meeting for
the person for whom you are scheduling
the meeting
to schedule Amazon chime meeting choose
the account to use to schedule the
meeting the calendar owner after you
select the type of meeting ID to use the
meet at chime des AWS address is added
to the to field if you choose a one time
meeting ID the pin plus ten digit
meeting ID is also added the body of
your existing meeting description is
populated with the Amazon chime meeting
instructions you can then edit as
necessary choose save and send if
prompted make sure you choose send
updates to all attendees so that
everyone including Amazon chime receives
the new meeting details that's all there
is to scheduling meetings for someone
else with Amazon chime
